availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Henrietta Ramey Mitchell in Christian County, Kentucky, on September 11, 1820. Father of David C. Mitchell and Frances C. Mitchell. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Long Pond in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2 p. 366A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 7.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 1057.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000465562, p. 29.
